content.p: Discover the benefits and impact of UNMâ€™s alumni network As a Nottingham Alumnus, you will be a part of the 17,000 UNM graduates, and 340,000 global Nottingham Alumni community. From professional networking events and reunions, to mentoring and career advisory tips, various opportunities await our alumni, and we want you to be a part of it. Meet our distinguished alumni and see where their careers have taken them today We are a global community of over 340,000 Nottingham graduates, who help current students and each other to be the best we can. Discover our world of networks, opportunities and life-long career support to help you now and in the future. You continue to benefit from the Career Advisory Service and support long after graduation, with access to one-to-one career guidance and global alumni networking. You are entitled to a scholarship with 10% off tuition fees if you register for full-time postgraduate programme after spending a period away from the University. The use of facilities at our Sports Complex is free of charge and available to alumni. Create your alumni ID to access our sports facilities today. On-campus accommodation for alumni is provided based on availability. Contact the Accommodation team to check for availability today. Get the latest scoop from our alumni features plus upcoming alumni events on our Instagram page. General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
